USA HAKCERS的信息。
[url=https://twitter.com/usahackers?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw%7Ctwcamp%5Etweetembed%7Ctwterm%5E1252653263280881664&ref_url=https%3A%2F%2Fmagamedia.org%2F2020%2F04%2F21%2Fbreaking-it-is-being-reported-that-the-gates-foundation-world-health-organization-and-wuhan-institute-of-virology-have-all-been-hacked-and-thousands-of-emails-passwords-and-documents-have-been-l%2F][/url]https://twitter.com/usahackers
https://usahackers.com/2020/04/21/bill-gates-id2020-exposed/

现在twitter上搜索gateshacked就会出来很多讨论。有兴趣的可以看看。目前武汉病毒研究所泄露出来的是21条邮箱地址和其密码。还是需要看后续有没有新的进展。
